content.text: In order to give the possibility to microservices (analytics in particular) to publish notifications, we need to extract the client library from the monolith.
Here is a high-level diagram showing the target structure.
All applications (especially analytics) should use the library to send notification instructions
Analytics shouldn`t use the organization database to obtain recipients
